short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension for FPL players

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Show all the captain picks in your mini-league, with one click, on the existing official Fantasy Premier League Table.

You must be on the on the official website with a mini-league table on display for the plugin to show the captain picks
